overview:
Horas, Wilujeng!

I am Kaspito Gabriel Hutagalung, you can simply call me Gabriel. A Visionary Entrepreneur who really loves to sing and does business; turning a simple & unique idea into a successful project! Works at ColorLabs since July 2009.

Currently studying Electrical Engineering at Maranatha Christian University. Born and lives in Bandung, a wonderful and historical city; nice to visit and comfortable to live in. Likes to meet many kind of people all over the world, sharing experiences and ideas to one another, having a good friendship and partnership to accomplish the calling in the end of this age!

What about you?
